        public static ODataServiceDocumentRequest getServiceDocumentRequest(String serviceRoot)
        Gets a service document request instance.
        Parameters:
        serviceRoot - absolute URL (schema, host and port included) representing the location of the root of the data service.
        Returns:
        new ODataServiceDocumentRequest instance.

      • getEntitySetRequest

        public static ODataEntitySetRequest getEntitySetRequest(URI query)

      • getEntitySetIteratorRequest

        public static ODataEntitySetIteratorRequest getEntitySetIteratorRequest(URI query)
        Gets a query request returning a set of one or more OData entities.

        Returned request gives the possibility to consume entities iterating on them without parsing and loading in memory the entire entity set.

        Parameters:
        query - query to be performed.
        Returns:
        new ODataEntitySetIteratorRequest instance.
